title: Select wallet
description: Select the wallet you want to use in the Marketplace. By default, we create a burner wallet in your browser allowing you to use all functionality without further setup.

buttons.title: Burner Wallet
buttons.description: Easiest way to use without further setup. But the wallet will be gone when you change browsers or clear your cache.

buttons.title: MetaMask
buttons.description: Most secure experience attaching everything you do in to an account you control. But you need to setup MetaMask first.
